DESCRIPTION:  Consultant Business Science (I9)  We are seeking a Business Science Consultant for a new position who has the entrepreneurial mindset to contribute to our growth and profitability, and can work toward developing a fundamentally new approach to how business generates meaning and value from data. As part of the Business Intelligence team, you will be responsible for drilling down into large quantities of data and driving organizational change. This position is an opportunity to join a team which is making its initial foray into call center speech and desktop analytics. This position requires an energetic, proactive professional with strong analytical and report modeling skills.
